resources.string: Wellcome your chat app where the world became a small village
Life became eassier with your app chatApp
If you do not have account click the button bellow to register
ChatApp is yours, give you the oportunity to communicate all over the world
In your chat app you can have fun with your friend and all other users if you want
If you have account click the button bellow now
By clicking RESET, you will receive an email to reset your password
